body: This is a question by [Alireza](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/profile/alireazarashidfar): Hello Friends, someone  could help telling me how can i put theses specific glazing ratios on each surface of this mass [](http://api.ning.com/files/FzBIK0EevxC6ADeYvkgQF2kkxoCCNF9vAh2nLmqCoIYrKjlkrC25cU3l12IyC*khy2mJF1aiN2Wu5BqneXDaNLm6zjlfPojj/1.PNG)
topic: How to assign glazing percentages to walls based on values

replies.body: Hi Ali, If you want to add percentages for each surface, and not based on orientation, you need to feed HBSurfaces into addGlazingPercentage component. You can put them back together as a zone afterwards. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/FzBIK0EevxBNpwLZ6-RhvKeCeDKJk5HFe2efzGqzS6cUz*7LOonOI31KSfrFfHKggwSFok05LmGFvn7jGXeRPeWEFK*xSZAb/assignPercentageBasedOnValues.png) Mostapha
